titles.title: A resolution congratulating the Florida State University football team for winning the 2014 Bowl Championship Series national championship.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary: 1/13/2014--Passed Senate without amendment. Congratulates the Florida State University football team for winning the 2014 Bowl Championship Series national championship.
